javadoc: Action that manages multiple PluginActions mapped to this action's key binding.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: provider
params.comment: the provider, if any, associated with the action

params.name: action
params.comment: action that will be added to the list of actions bound to a keystroke

params.name: keyStroke
params.comment: the keystroke, if any, associated with the action

methods.javadoc: Returns the enabled state of the Action. When enabled, any component associated with this object is active and able to fire this object's actionPerformed method. @return true if this Action is enabled
methods.name: isEnabled
methods.comment:
Returns the enabled state of the Action. When enabled,
 any component associated with this object is active and
 able to fire this object's actionPerformed method.

return.comment: true if this Action is enabled

methods.javadoc:
Enables or disables the action.  This affects all uses
 of the action.  Note that for popups, this affects whether or
 not the option is "grayed out", not whether the action is added
 to the popup.
@param newValue true to enable the action, false to
                  disable it
@see Action#setEnabled
methods.name: setEnabled
methods.comment:
Enables or disables the action.  This affects all uses
 of the action.  Note that for popups, this affects whether or
 not the option is "grayed out", not whether the action is added
 to the popup.

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
true to enable the action, false to
                  disable it

name: MultipleKeyAction
comment: Action that manages multiple PluginActions mapped to this action's key binding.
